titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the kings of Scotland Together with their seuerall armes, wiues, and issue.
titleStmt.author: Milles, Tho. (Thomas), 1550?-1627?

notesStmt.note: Intended to be issued with some copies of: Milles, Thomas. The catalogue of honour (STC 17926).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
